name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Whoa...
What's going on, monsters
are suddenly appearing in droves!

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
I don't know! Anyway,
we have to do something
to get the customers to safety!

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Even as apprentices, we're heroes!
It's time to show some guts here!

While Rokusei and the others were attracting
the giant monster, heroes were also fighting
in the sea area.

The apprentices form a circle around the visitors
and intercept the approaching monsters.

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
But how do we get them out!?
The path to the coast is destroyed, and
the sea is full of tentacles, so we can't launch a boat!

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Stop complaining, we're in front of the customers!
Anyway, even if it's little by little,
we have to reduce the number of monsters-

name: Apprentices
text: A huge one appeared~!!

The apprentices confront the swarm of monsters,
half in a panic.

Because, heroes cannot
turn their backs on the encroaching threat
in front of the people they must protect.

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Damn it, if that's the case-?
Whoa, what's that!?

Above the apprentice hero, who is preparing for
a desperate charge, and even further beyond
the large monster.

Several steel pipes fly towards the monster,
which is raising its arm to attack,
and pierce it one after another.

name: Monster
text:
Guh, gyaa...
Gyaooooonnn!!

Its core is crushed by irregularly growing lumps of iron
from the pierced spots, and the monster disappears.

Genji picks up his Parallel Weapon,
which clattered to the floor,
and checks his surroundings.

name: Apprentices
text: Help has arrived~!!

Genji pays no attention to the excited apprentices
and scratches the floor with the Parallel Weapon
in his hand.

Just like when he crushed the monster,
lumps of iron grow randomly from the scratched spot.

name: Genji
text:
This should serve as a barricade.
...You held out well, apprentices.

Genji looks towards the platform he created in the air.
Two figures are rushing towards them-
Goro and Pubraseer arrived.

name: Goro
text:
Move aside, it's dangerous-
"Construction",
High-End Construct!!

Goro deploys his toolbox-shaped Parallel Weapon,
jumps from the platform, and lands
on the floor of the sea area.

The next moment, construction materials spring up
on their own, forming an evacuation shelter
that surrounds the visitors.

name: Goro
text:
Leave the civilian protection to me!
Let's quickly defeat the monster
and protect Orient City!

name: Pubraseer
text:
I will support you all-
"Shine"!
PÃ©nte Anamniseis!!!

Pubraseer's Parallel Weapon deploys,
and a wind blows towards the flag as if urging it on.
It heals his companions' wounds and encourages them.

name: Apprentice Hero
text:
Whoaaaaaah!?
As expected of our seniors,
we immediately got organized!

The apprentices are inspired by the arrival
of veteran heroes, who are also figures of admiration
active on the front lines.

To restore the evacuation route,
and first to suppress this area,
they confronted the monster.

name: Goro
text:
Labor's Site, we arrived at the sea area.
Rescue operation for stranded citizens are underway.
No problems here, but still, in the sea-

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
-The big one in the sea is being
dealt with by me and my companions.
Don't worry, just prioritize rescue!

A person who shouldn't be there-
the man who was "supposed to be" evacuating the boys,
reported the situation through the device.

Goro and Pubraseer are surprised, and
Genji glares at the coast with a furious expression.
Everyone knew who the voice belonged to.

name: Goro
text:
Leave this to us and go.
While you're at it, please repair
the destroyed path, Genji!

Genji smashes a nearby monster,
taking out his frustration,
then turns his back on the scene and runs.

Whether Rokusei is challenging alone,
or if he's involved Sterio,
either way, for them to transform-

name: Genji
text:
...Well, I kind of knew it, but
you "too" are the type to observe
from the front lines, [Player].

Just as Rokusei wanted to get the boys to safety,
Genji didn't want the Observer to be in danger.

However, he himself understands
that it is merely his own ego.

Feeling the strong will of [Player] and the others
expressed implicitly, the veteran hero
resolves to protect their backs.

name: Genji
text:
It's well said that others are one's mirror.
Only disobedient people gather around me.

The monster swings its arm down with force.
The moment he received it, he quickly
twisted the steel pipe and slams it into the monster's body.

Immediately, he moves his hand like sliding
on an axis and changes his stance,
then smashes the core from close range.

name: Genji
text:
Well, being stubborn might be
necessary for a hero in some ways...
I'll gladly witness your pride.

Genji laughs fearlessly, raises his Parallel Weapon,
shaped like a long staff, in front of him,
and invites the monster's next attack to himself.

Chapter 7:
Resolute Action Scares Even Gods

Meanwhile, at sea,
the tide of battle is changing dramatically
with the participation of new heroes.

Thanks to the foothold that formed
like a lid on the sea surface,
surprise attacks from directly below by tentacles were prevented.

name: Octopus Monster
text: -Gyaoooohhh!!

Canes' thrown mechanical arm Parallel Weapon
intercepts the tentacles that the giant monster
swung down at Rokusei.

It follows its companions as if it has a will,
sometimes acting as a shield, sometimes as a spear,
supporting the battle.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Canes-kun, your Parallel Weapon
was really convenient!
What kind of mechanism is it?

name: Canes
text:
I don't know, but for now,
it's enough if I can use it!

He discards all thoughts other than those necessary for the current battle,
sends one arm to assist his comrade,
and uses the other arm to intercept the monster.

Seeing his sibling confronting it recklessly,
Sterio's voltage rises even further.

name: Sterio
text:
Woah-oon!
Don't run away!
Having received the heroes' fierce attacks, the giant monster tries to dive into the sea.

But Sterio, with the storm he created,
pulls in the surrounding currents
so it can't escape.

Canes continues to observe the enemy and his allies
to seize the perfect opportunity
to finish off the target.

name: Canes
text:
...It's strange. It's my first battle,
and I just transformed, but
my body moves as I intend.

name: Canes
text:
What is a Parallel Weapon...?
It feels like I'm "wearing myself",
without any sense of discomfort...

His observation extended to himself.
In the past, when he first participated in a hunt,
he couldn't accomplish anything-

name: Canes
text:
-No, nothing has changed since then.
It's still the same as that time when I was lost,
but I resolved to never give up and definitely return with my sibling.

name: Canes
text:
That's right, I'll definitely overcome this situation.
Working together with Sterio,
Rokusei-san, and [Player]-san!

Trust in his sibling and companions
outweighs anxiety and fear,
and the boy gains certainty of victory.

name: Canes
text: -Now, [Player]-san!!

dialogue_after_selection.text: Rokusei understands everything and changes his tactics just by the tone of [Player]'s voice calling him.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Leave it to me, [Player]!
Awooooh~!!

text:
Canes recalls the Parallel Weapon
he had sent to assist his comrade,
crouches, and prepares to punch.

In time with Sterio's horn, Rokusei
quickly distances himself from the giant monster
and throws all his Parallel Weapons.

The water mass returns to its original spot,
sucked into the tornado that has risen,
and then the sound of the horn echoes again.

The even larger tornado sucks in even the giant
monster, and twists its body
with a powerful vortex of wind.

While his companions corner the monster,
Canes continues to increase the output
of his two Parallel Weapons.

name: Canes
text:
Not yet, not yet, don't rush-
Everyone will surely create the chance
to unleash a powerful blow...!

The accumulated energy creates fire,
and then crackles and
releases electricity into the surroundings.

name: Octopus Monster
text: -Gyaoooohhh!!

The giant monster emits a sound that is neither a scream nor a threat,
and tries to escape
into the sea-

name: Sterio
text:
You won't escape-
"Pursuit Howl"!
Storm of Shifting Seasons!!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
"Secret Arts",
Water Element Three-Way Fusion!!

The third booming horn further amplifies the tornado.
It twists and tears off all tentacles,
and lifts the monster's massive body into the air.

Rokusei immediately detonates the lifted
Parallel Weapons,
destroying the monster's outer shell.

name: Canes
text:
-Now!
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!!

He focuses his strength as if
he was drawing a bow, aiming a hunting rifle,
targeting the vital point and not taking his eyes off it.

Even if he's an apprentice,
the inherited techniques and Canes' own strength,
and the bonds he formed on Earth-

name: Canes
text:
-I will seize victory!
"Capture," Winter's...

name: Canes
text: ...Thunder Hammer!!

A flash. With the sound of air being torn apart,
he is carried by the wind created by his sibling,
and pierces through without even a moment's delay.

A heavy, sharp hammer-shaped fist utterly shatters
what lies deep within the breached outer shell.

name: Octopus Monster
text:
Gyaooo!?
Gyaoooooonnn!!

name: Canes
text:
Haa, haa...!
It's over, right?

The remnants of the destroyed monster
turn into particles of light
and dissolve into the sky.

name: Sterio
text:
...Whoa-o-o-o-o-oh!!
We did it~!
We defeated the monster!!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Good work, you two.
It was a trial by fire, but
the rookie trio's teamwork worked well!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehe...
It's my job to help everyone, and I'm super happy to have fulfilled my role!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I think it's all thanks to you fighting with me, [Player].
Thank you, thank you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hahaha. Even though I'm a rookie, somehow, I understood the plan you were thinking of~
Rokusei smiles, recalling his previous experience of operating and fighting alongside him, but doesn't speak of it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's thanks to Rokusei-san and Sterio cornering the monster. And-
Because you observed me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you... hahaha.
I'm so happy.
I finally feel like I could be useful to someone.

text:
A voice calls "Hey!" from afar.
When [Player] turns around,
they see Goro and Pubraseer.

They rush towards each other and confirm their safety.
When everyone steps onto the beach,
the foothold on the sea surface quietly disappears.

name: Goro
text:
You're both so reckless.
You two are exactly like your
father and mother in that regard.

name: Goro
text:
Rokusei, I was surprised when I
heard your voice on the comms, but...
Thanks for protecting these guys.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Haha, I just spoke impulsively.
I'm sorry for causing unnecessary worry
during the rescue operation.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hehe... At that time,
I wish I could have shown you
Genji glaring in your direction with such intensity.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
S-so that's how it was!?
If he was close, I might have been punched,
I'm glad I was fighting on the sea...

name: Genji
text:
You went to a place like that
while responsible for the lives of the guests,
so a single punch would be a good outcome.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text: Whoa, that scared me!?

Genji approaches Rokusei from behind
and speaks into his ear
with a menacing voice.

name: Goro
text:
Hahahaha! Well, it's fine.
All's well that ends well...
Speaking of which, we still have business to attend to.

name: Pubraseer
text:
We'll escort the rescued visitors from the sea area
to the evacuation shelter.
You all should rest first.

Saying "See you later," Goro
leaves the spot with Pubraseer.

In the distance, the apprentices
could be seen waving
with the visitors.

The venue's broadcast can be heard.
It's an announcement to the visitors that the monster threat
has passed and about safety confirmation.

name: Canes
text:
â¦â¦â¦â¦â¦.
That's good, safe and sound-

The feeling that the battle was over, and the sense of relief
from hearing the kind voices of those he trusted,
snapped his tension.

Canes' body, having been untransformed,
collapses at the knees
and falls onto the sandy beach-

dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player] and Sterio
support Canes' body simultaneously from both sides.

name: Sterio
text:
Canes, are you okay!?
Does it hurt anywhere, are you injured?

name: Canes
text:
No, I just let my guard down a bit.
...Thank you, I'm fine now.

name: Sterio
text:
You're not fine!
If you don't tell me the truth,
I won't forgive you... Humph!

name: Canes
text:
Whoa, stop it, Sterio!
I can stand on my own, everyone's watching,
it's embarrassing, isn't it!?

Sterio easily lifts and carries
the clearly exhausted Canes on his back,
refusing to let go.

name: Genji
text:
No one here would be ashamed to see you two.
Just let your sibling pamper you for now, kid.

Hearing Genji's words, which held kindness
within their rough tone, Canes meekly gives in.

name: Canes
text:
Sorry, Sterio...
Then I'll rest for a bit, thank you.

name: Rokusei
text:
Oh, did he fall asleep?
He really was at his limit, wasn't he?
Well, it can't be helped.

name: Rokusei
text:
Then let's all go to the infirmary.
Sterio-kun, you should also get yourself
checked once to see if you're injured.

name: Genji
text:
That's your job.
I'm heading to the next site.
See ya... rest well, kids.

Genji turns his back to everyone
and leaves, along with his farewell words.

name: Rokusei
text:
He's quite a difficult person, isn't he?
...No, perhaps he's just shy
about being with young people?

name: Rokusei
text:
Well, deepening our friendship can wait for another time,
for now, let's take care of ourselves.
Come on, Sterio-kun.

Seeing Canes and Sterio off to the infirmary,
Rokusei and [Player]
move to the food area.

There were no customers yet as safety checks were still ongoing,
but the members of Parallel Flight Company
had finished their respective missions and returned.

name: Akashi
text:
[Player]!!
You're not hurt anywhere, are you?
I saw the battle broadcast in the sea area.

name: Akashi
text:
The president told me that
the rookie you were with had no problem
with his abilities, but...

name: Rokusei
text:
Oh, it seems the president
trusts me quite a bit.
That's good!

name: Rokusei
text:
I'm sorry it's so soon after the situation was resolved,
but shall we report what happened to us,
[Player]?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Akashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wait, wait!
Rokusei-san, please, could you tell the story instead?
This person's explanation is super intuitive!

name: Akashi
text:
Hoh~ a newly awakened person
defeated a giant monster... That's amazing.
Wait, no, it must have been tough for them.

name: Sui
text:
Hearing stories like this,
I can't help but remember
when I became a hero.

name: Mokdai
text:
Yeah, yeah... I see,
Canes-kun also safely became
a hero. That's good.

name: Crowne
text:
Hero activities often involve life-threatening risks.
We've been through a lot, and
we're aware of that, but-

name: Crowne
text:
I think it's a harsh industry
for kids in their teens to enter.
Can they really make it?

name: Rokusei
text:
Hmm, I think there's nothing to worry about?
As far as I've seen in just a few days of interacting
with them... but that's just my opinion.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: They straight up accepted the words of the active heroes they met at Hero Festa.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: So I'm sure they'll grow up to be wonderful heroes of the next generation that everyone will admire.

options.text: That's up to them, I guess...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, that's surprisingly cautious, isn't it?
...Indeed, [Player]-kun is right, though.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text: Situations much harsher than this incident can often occur...

name: Huckle
text:
I-if they were still the way they were
when I first met them, I would have
stopped them from becoming heroes.

name: Huckle
text:
They're not like Mokdai-kun. It's very dangerous
to aim to be a hero just out of admiration
without knowing the threat of monster.

name: Huckle
text:
Moreover, we deal not only with monster,
but also with villains-
even other humans.

name: Huckle
text:
It's good that our companions are increasing,
but I can't welcome it unconditionally.
It's very difficult.

name: Ryekie
text:
What Huckle says is true, but
I want to believe in their potential!
At least, from what I've heard in the report so far!

name: Ryekie
text:
I feel that they already have a sense of justice!
Then surely, they will overcome any obstacle!!!!

Even though he showed some understanding
of his partner's words, Huckle's expression
remained stern.

Then Rokusei makes a proposal
to the veteran hero.

name: Rokusei
text:
-President Huckle.
How about you talk to them directly?

The next day, Canes and Sterio,
who had slept until noon, are informed
by the hotelier that they have visitors.

After getting ready and heading to the lobby,
Rokusei and [Player] were waiting there.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text: Sorry... Sterio and I couldn't wake up at all, so we just woke up and finished breakfast.

name: Canes
text:
Good morning, everyone.
We were planning to greet you, but we overslept...

name: Canes
text:
But Rokusei-san, Player-san,
why did you two come to see us?

name: Rokusei
text:
That's obvious, isn't it?
The meritorious ones
should naturally be rewarded, right?

name: Sterio
text:
Reward!?
What, what kind of reward will you give us?
Something we can share?

name: Canes
text:
Don't be so greedy, Sterio!
What if you pounce on Rokusei-san
again and crush him!?

name: Rokusei
text:
Ahahahaha! You're so young,
it looks like you two are
completely fine, health-wise, huh?

name: Rokusei
text:
Then it looks like it's okay
to take you out of the hotel.
Are you two ready to go out?

name: Canes
text:
Going out...?
It's still Hero Festa period, right?
Are we going somewhere else today?

options.text: It's different, in a way, but-
Our destination is indeed Hero Festa.
Well, you can look forward to it.

text:
[Player] and Rokusei
take the boys out and
head towards-

name: Canes
text:
The stadium!
Come to think of it, today is the
O-1 Grand Prix finals, isn't it?

name: Sterio
text:
Are we going to watch the match now?
But, but, Canes and I didn't buy tickets!

name: Rokusei
text:
It's okay. [Player]-kun and I
have already made arrangements,
so you two can enter too.

name: Canes
text:
Amazing~!
Thank you very much!!

[Player] takes the happy two
and enters the stadium through
the staff-only entrance.

However, the path leads in the opposite direction
from the spectator seating indicated on the walls and floor,
and Rokusei, who is accompanying them, shows no sign of pointing it out.

Just as their anticipation began to turn into unease,
wondering where they were being taken,
the footsteps of those ahead stopped.

In front of them is a single door.
Urged to open it,
Canes knocks on the door.

-Come in!
It's open!!

The person on the other side answers
with a volume that makes the door tremble.
There's no mistaking that voice-

name: Two People
text: -It's Justice!!

name: Justice
text:
Hahah! That's right!!
Welcome to our dressing room,
rookies!!!

Opening the door with gusto,
the person exactly as the boys imagined
greets them with full force.

name: Rokusei
text:
Hey, [Player]-kun...
Did he really wait for us like that
in his transformed state and flexing all that time?

options.text: Heroes are always at full power!

name: Sterio
text:
Real, real!?
Whoa~ so amazing!
I can brag to Papa and Mama~!

name: Canes
text:
Eh, but why?
Justice, you aren't participating in
this O-1 Grand Prix, right?

name: Huckle
text:
Oh, you know quite a lot.
Then perhaps you can figure
out why we're here?

The man who smiles and asks questions,
seeing the surprised and joyful boys,
is someone the boys also know-

name: Canes
text:
Huckle-san!?
This is the players' waiting room, right?
Then it means you're going to participate in the match...

name: Canes
text:
Ah! It's an exhibition battle!
Come to think of it, they said this time,
the winning team and special guests would fight, right?

options.text: So this is the request from the Grand Prix.

text:
Huckle nods, confirming that's correct.
He continues speaking.

name: Huckle
text:
However, another hero show
has suddenly been added.

name: Huckle
text:
There was the monsters commotion yesterday, right?
The stadium was unharmed, but
all the visitors had a scary experience.

name: Huckle
text:
So, they wanted to add
one more hero show that would give
everyone hope for the future.

Canes and Sterio's eyes sparkle,
listening intently to Huckle's words.

They were convinced that Rokusei's reward
was the right to watch the heroes' match
up close. However-

name: Huckle
text:
-How about it, rookies.
Would you like to try fighting
me and Justice?

name: Canes & Sterio
text: Whaaaaaat!?

Canes and Sterio are flustered
by Huckle's outrageous proposal.

They have seen him fight directly in broadcasts,
and in Huckle's case, with their own eyes.

They shouldn't be able to find any chance of victory
against a veteran hero who easily defeated
many apprentices by himself.

name: Canes
text:
No way...
We, who only experienced combat yesterday,
can't possibly win against Huckle-san and Justice!

name: Huckle
text:
Canes-kun-
Can you say those words the same way
in front of the people you're supposed to protect?

name: Huckle
text:
If we were villains who
kidnapped your precious family,
would you give up like that?

Canes chokes on his words
at Huckle's point.

name: Huckle
text:
If you're going to be active as heroes from now on,
you'll face many difficult
and sudden situations like this.

name: Huckle
text:
You can run, or you can face it.
The important thing is, for whom
you make that choice.

name: Huckle
text:
Now, I'll ask again.
Rookies, are you willing to
fight against us?

Canes hesitates. Even if he puts
his whole being into it, he probably can't
match the veteran heroes' skill.

But if this wasn't a hero show,
but a real fight to the death-
he couldn't think of any other option than to fight.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
He is startled by [Player]'s words.
He was again thinking only within himself and trying to reach a conclusion.
Canes looks at his sibling, who is also being questioned by Huckle whether to fight or not.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course I'll fight!
I'm a hunting dog, to run away just because the opponent is strong?
I've never thought of such a thing!

He realizes it from Sterio's words.
Again, he was thinking only within himself, and didn't even try to consult his partner.
Canes looks up and looks at his sibling, who chose to fight without hesitation.

While holding his head, Canes realized.
He is the one making the choice, but this problem is also being asked of his sibling-
He decides to first listen to his partner's opinion and looks at Sterio.

name: Sterio
text:
It's okay. Canes is strong.
I'm strong too, we're the children of the strongest
hunters, Papa and Mama. So we won't lose!

Without any basis,
but also without bluffing,
Sterio proudly proclaims with confidence.

His sibling's words, simply believing
in the strength of his family,
were incredibly reassuring to Canes at that moment.

name: Canes
text:
...Surely, the old me would have
been exasperated or angry, saying
"Don't be so reckless."

name: Canes
text:
But now, I understand Sterio's words.
If we combine our strengths, even impossible things
can be overturned.

Encouraged by his sibling's powerful assertion,
Canes' expression changes.

He understands that aiming for victory in the hero show
is not for himself. It is for the citizens
who wish for peace and entrust their hope to heroes.

name: Canes
text: -Yes, please!!

Canes bows deeply to Huckle, Ryekie,
and [Player], and Sterio follows suit.

name: Rokusei
text:
Well, well, that's an amazing decision, isn't it?
It's a rare opportunity, but to fight against veterans...
Is that youth, perhaps?

name: Huckle
text:
Hmm? What are you saying
as if you're not involved, "Rokusei-kun"?
You're also one of the rookies, aren't you?

name: Huckle
text:
The calls I've been making aren't just for
Sterio-kun and Canes-kun.
They're for "all three rookies".

name: Rokusei
text: Seriously!?

Rokusei, who had been watching their exchange
as if it were someone else's problem,
involuntarily shouts at the sudden turn of events.

He had assumed that Huckle, who knew his true identity,
must have been referring to the two boys as "rookies."

Furthermore, it was Rokusei himself who proposed
this hero show, and he never even considered
participating himself.

name: Rokusei
text:
No, no, I'm a rookie, but
I'm also an old man, and in terms of position,
it's a bit awkward to join between the two fresh ones...

name: Canes
text:
Right, Rokusei-san is a rookie too!
It would be reassuring if you fought with us!

name: Sterio
text:
Rokusei, ever since we met,
you've been doing all sorts of amazing things,
you're incredibly reliable!

name: Canes
text:
Right, Rokusei-san!
Just like when we defeated that giant monster,
let's fight together!

name: Rokusei
text:
Ah, the dazzling gaze of youth is piercing me!
Come to think of it, haven't I been
at your mercy ever since I met you!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-kun, why are you so enthusiastic!?
Were you always so fond of battles?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You say good things, [Player]-kun!
Well, it doesn't change the awkward situation at all, but...

text:
The boys, unaware that Rokusei
is actually a defense agency intelligence officer,
look at him with innocent anticipation.

name: Rokusei
text:
(This will surely leave a record, won't it?
How should I report this to my superiors?
...Well, I'll just have to think about it later!)

name: Rokusei
text:
Alright, alright!
It seems I have no choice but to brace myself...
I'll do my best.

name: Canes & Sterio
text:
Yay~!
Thank you very much!!

name: Huckle
text:
It's decided, then. There's still
time before the main event. Get ready
in the next dressing room.

name: Justice
text:
I'm looking forward to it! Let's compete with each other
and make it a good battle that gives hope
to all citizens!! Hahahahaha!!!

With the consent of their opponents,
the stadium's operating committee officially
announces it to the audience.

name: Audience
text:
Hey, look at the screen.
"Special Hero Show to be held"
...Soon!?

name: Audience
text:
The participating heroes will be
a secret until the match begins, huh, that sounds interesting.
I'll go buy more drinks now!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Well... it's finally showtime.
Everyone, are you mentally prepared?

name: Sterio
text:
I'm ready~!
I'm super excited to fight strong heroes.
Hurry, hurry, let's start the battle!

name: Canes
text:
Yeah... that's right...
Fighting in front of so many people,
I have to do it well...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Y-yes!
I'm going to run a bit to loosen up!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Woof!?
Canes, wait, wait, the battle is about to begin, isn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, it's probably not funny for him, but it's interesting how they're polar opposites, isn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course, I'm ready.
There's nothing I trust more than your operation.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Come on, let's go.
At this point, whatever happens, happens.
Let's enjoy ourselves to the fullest, borrowing the veterans' strength!

name: MC
text:
O-1 Grand Prix,
Special Hero Show!!

name: MC
text:
In this stadium where hero agency
representatives vie for supremacy,
new heroes are making a surprise entrance!

name: MC
text:
Everyone, you remember yesterday's events, right?
The incident where monsters appeared
all over the Hero Festa venue!

name: MC
text:
Many heroes protected everyone,
but do you know there were rookies
who just debuted among them?

name: MC
text:
Oh, it seems there are people in the audience
who have realized what's about to happen, huh?

name: MC
text:
Alright, let's start right away!
Special Hero Show, first,
I'll introduce the fighters-!

name: MC
text:
The meritorious person who suppressed the monster the other day,
a promising rookie full of youth appears!
Seize victory with your giant fists-

name: MC
text: <strong>Rookie Hero, Canes!!

name: MC
text:
One was also very active yesterday!
Overwhelming presence, or perhaps surprisingly healing?
Create a whirlwind in the stadium-

name: MC
text: <strong>Rookie Hero, Sterio!!

name: MC
text:
Unknown background, undisclosed agency,
why and what are you doing here!?
The truth is shrouded in mist-

name: MC
text: <strong>Mysterious Veteran Rookie, Rokusei!!

name: MC
text:
The rookies who defeated the giant monster
that rampaged in the sea area with the three of them,
are now appearing in this stadium-!

name: MC
text:
What kind of heroes will they face-
Now introducing their opponents!

name: MC
text:
That legend has returned!
The former S-rank hero's kicking techniques are still alive!
A traveler who traverses the world and even space-

name: MC
text: <strong>Hopper the Face!!

name: MC
text:
No introduction needed!
Roar to the heavens, echo through the earth, the roar of justice
of the S-rank hero who continues to reign supreme-

name: MC
text: <strong>Zap the Justice!!

name: MC
text:
Orient City's proudest veteran hero duo
will face the rookies' reckless challenge!

name: MC
text:
From here on, you can't miss a single second!
Special Hero Show
-Match, start!!
Battle Start

note:
The following text is displayed right inside the battle,
so for the best experience, I'd recommend opening the game right beside it!

name: Justice
text:
Hah-hah! It's finally begun!!
Rookie heroes!!! Please, by all means,
show us your full power!!!!

name: Hopper
text:
Their ability to defeat giant monsters,
feel free to test how well it works
against humans.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Geez, is this what veterans' composure are like?
Canes-kun, Sterio-kun,
you two say something back!

name: Canes
text:
...Eh!? Yes, sir.
Nice to meet you!

name: Sterio
text: I'll do my best too~!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text: So serious!?
Trigger condition: End of Turn 1

name: Justice
text:
Indeed! They have good potential!!
But, attacks of that level
won't work against us at all!!!

name: Hopper
text:
Their teamwork isn't bad either. They understand
each other's roles. However--
that alone won't let you surpass us.

name: Sterio
text:
I'm surprised, these two
are tough and fast, super strong!
This is getting fun!

name: Canes
text:
We won't lose either--
But how should we attack?
I can't find any openings at all!

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Oh dear~ those two fell for the seniors'
obvious provocation.
[Player]-kun, can you hear me?
Trigger condition: End of Turn 2

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Stop!! Canes-kun, Sterio-kun,
just calm down a little, relax~!
You're not the only ones fighting!

name: Canes
text:
Oh...! Sorry, Rokusei-san,
[Player]-san.
We just moved on our own.

name: Sterio
text: Whine... Sorry.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
Feeling alright, you two?
When fighting as heroes,
listen carefully to the operation and maneuver.

name: Rokusei (Rookies)
text:
If "all of us fight together" in this battle,
we can surely win. As for where to attack from--
[Player]-kun, I'm counting on your instructions!

name: Canes
text:
That's right... understood.
[Player]-san,
I'm counting on you again!

note:
The following dialogue will change depending on who you reduce to 50% HP first.
Interestingly, none of them will trigger if you get both of them at the same time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Justice
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa!? You're quite good!!
As expected of those who defeated a giant monster with just three people!!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hopper
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, so you're trying to take down Justice first.
It seems bold, but it's not a bad judgment.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hopper
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Guh...! You're surprisingly good.
A variety of combinations that leverage individual strengths, that's your forte, isn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Justice
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh-hoh, so you intend to combine forces and defeat Hopper first!
That's a solid way to fight!! Good job!!!

note:
The following dialogue will change depending on who you defeat first.
Un-interestingly, unlike the above condition, you cannot defeat both of them at the same time,
as any AOE attack (Rokusei's S3) will only reduce their HP to 1 at most.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hopper
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh...!
You made Justice kneel, huh?
Is this the result of your true resolve?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hopper
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, can you keep fighting like that until the end?
I think it's about time I shift gears up another notch!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa, whoa, whoa!?
That's unfair, President~!
You're not saying you're out of practice, are you!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa!?
Justice fell, and ViewPower increased a lot.
Is this our chance, or not?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You can't get discouraged at this point...!
Please, [Player]-san.
Let's finish this in one go!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Justice
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hopper!?
...You're good to defeat my partner!
As expected of a promising veteran rookie!! Hah-hah!!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Justice
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright!
In deference to you all, I'll also give it my all!!
Whoa-o-o-o-o-oh!!!!!!!!!!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Rokusei (Rookies)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gah!
Justice wasn't even serious yet!?
How strong are S-rank heroes anyway!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Canes
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...!
ViewPower rapidly gathered with this development.
Is this a chance for us...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sterio
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No turning back now!
[Player], let's finish this in one go~!!

text: Trigger condition: Both Justice and Hopper is defeated

name: Justice
text:
Whoa!? Brilliant, rookies!!
I see... your operation
drew out their full power!!!

name: Hopper
text:
You did well, [Player]-kun.
Even as your opponent, as your superior,
I can't help but be happy about your growth...!
